A

AddAppointmentController - Class in Controller
This AddAppointmentController Class is linked to the add-appointment.fxml file which controls the view users will use to fill in a form for adding an appointment to the database.
AddAppointmentController() - Constructor for class Controller.AddAppointmentController
 
AddCustomerController - Class in Controller
A controller class the implements some logic for the Add Cusotmer view where users can create a customer.
AddCustomerController() - Constructor for class Controller.AddCustomerController
 
addressLabel - Variable in class Controller.CustomerController
The label for the address text field.
addressTextField - Variable in class Controller.CustomerController
The text field where the user enters the address of the Customer
AlertUtil - Class in Utils
Class for showing Warning Dialogs to the user
AlertUtil() - Constructor for class Utils.AlertUtil
 
Appointment - Class in Model
Model class for Appointments.
Appointment(int, String, String, String, String, Timestamp, Timestamp, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Model.Appointment
Appointment Constructor A Note about ID Creation: To be clear about ids and when they are created, they are created by the MySQL instance when the appointment is entered into the database.
AppointmentController - Class in Controller
Generic controller for adding and modifying appoinments
AppointmentController() - Constructor for class Controller.AppointmentController
 
appointmentOverlapWarning() - Static method in class Utils.AlertUtil
Displays when the user attempts to create or modify an appointment to exist on a time that overlaps with another already existing appointment in the database.
AppointmentReportController - Class in Controller
This is the controller class for the appt-reports.fxml view.
AppointmentReportController() - Constructor for class Controller.AppointmentReportController
 
appointmentSelectWarningDelete() - Static method in class Utils.AlertUtil
Displays when the user has clicked the Delete button underneath the Appointments table, but has not clicked an appointment to delete from that table.
appointmentSelectWarningModify() - Static method in class Utils.AlertUtil
Displays when the user has clicked the Modify button underneath the Appointments table, but has not clicked an appointment to modify from that table.
